actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption for purposes of the Federal estate tax from $60,000 to $200,000.

summary.text: Provides that the value of a taxable estate under the Internal Revenue Code shall be determined by deducting $200,000 (in lieu of the present exemption of $60,000) from the value of the gross estate.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption for purposes of the Federal estate tax from $60,000 to $200,000.
